ARABIC: لَوْ نَشَآءُ جَعَلْنَٰهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If We wished We could have made it bitter, so will you not give thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We could make it brackish, if We pleased; so why do you not acknowledge thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: If We had so pleased, We could have made it bitter. So why would you not give thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Had We wanted, We could have made it salty. Why then do you not give thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: If We will We can make it bitter, so why do you not give thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: If We willed, We verily could make it salty; why then do you not give thanks
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: If We pleased, We would have made it salty; why do you not then give thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Did We will, We would make it bitter; so why are you not thankful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: If We willed We verily could make it bitter. Why then, give ye not thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If We so pleased, We certainly could make it salty. Why, then, are you not grateful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: If We willed, surely We would make it brackish. Wherefore give ye not thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: If We wish We can make it bitter. Then why do you not give thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Were it Our Will, We could make it salt (and unpalatable): then why do ye not give thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: If We willed, We verily could make it salt (and undrinkable), why then do you not give thanks (to Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If We will, We would make it bitter, why then do you not give thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: If We will, We can make it salty. Will you not be thankful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:70] If We willed, We could make it bitter, salty, undrinkable — why then will you not give thanks?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (If We willed We verily could make it) i.e. pure water (bitter. Why, then, give ye not thanks) for its purity and therefore believe?
